sources.title: Timber War (1935) KERMIT MAYNARDüçï COWBOY WESTERN
sources.description:
First Time on YouTube!
Stars: Kermit Maynard, Lucille Lund, Lawrence Gray
Director: Sam Newfield
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLmHgXUJMN1TU70mlZBH2osHskpnznWkQh
Enter the rough-and-tumble world of the lumber frontier in this classic action Western produced by Ambassador Pictures and directed by Sam Newfield. Inspired by a short story by celebrated author James Oliver Curwood, this fast-moving frontier tale explores the fierce competition between rival timber operations in the Pacific Northwest.

Kermit Maynard leads the charge with a rugged performance as a forest ranger caught in a web of sabotage and corporate greed. He‚Äôs joined by Lucille Lund, Frank Glendon, and John Merton, whose roles bring added intrigue and tension to the plot. With its dramatic forest settings, authentic logging action, and tightly wound conflict, this early B-movie showcases the genre's expansion beyond deserts and saloons into new, perilous territory.

Are you a PizzaFLIX Fanatic? Join our exclusive Fan Club for dedicated Classic movie lovers: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCE34fwgW7kWr7tc7YiOWtRw/join

üé¨ Like, comment, and subscribe for more authentic Western adventures and rare public domain treasures brought back to life.

Perfect for fans of classic Westerns, vintage action films, and 1930s Hollywood, this forgotten frontier drama brings it back to life. Watch history unfold in a raw, energetic snapshot of Depression-era storytelling.

#TimberWar #KermitMaynard #ClassicWestern #SamNewfield #Lucille Lund #JamesOliverCurwood #VintageAction #LoggingWestern #Lawrence Gray #pizzaflix

metadata.Plot: The owners of a lumber mill hire an investigator to find out who is sabotaging their mill. He discovers that the sabotage is being committed by the mill's manager, who is taking payoffs from rival mill owners. He devises a plan to expose the corrupt manager.
metadata.Writer: James Oliver Curwood, Joseph O'Donnell, Barry Barringer
metadata.Actors: Kermit Maynard, Lucille Lund, Lawrence Gray
